creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: humorous vignettes of actors, animals satirizing humans, caricatures of immortals; people playing games; humorous fables, etc.; string bound, red-orange cover
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Kyōsai Drunken Pictures (Vol. 1)
